text: "Let Me!" is a song written by Mark Lindsay and performed by Paul Revere & the Raiders. It reached #20 on the U.S. pop chart in 1969. It was featured on their 1969 album Alias Pink Puzz. The song was arranged and produced by Mark Lindsay. The song ranked #100 on Billboard magazine's Top 100 singles of 1969. ==References== Category:1969 songs Category:1969 singles Category:Paul Revere & the Raiders songs Category:Columbia Records singles
title: Let Me (Paul Revere & the Raiders song)
